column3: hom mfa ehurusi mbɔ ose mma Nyankopɔn:"

column2: "Hom ntow ndwom mma ne dzin n’enyimnyam: Hom mma ne nkamfoe nyɛ enyimnyam."

column3: Mbrɛ wo ndwuma dua yɛ hu a: Wo tum ne kɛseyɛ ntsi w’atamfo bɛbrɛ hɔnho adze ama wo."

column2: "Asaase nyinara bɔsɔr wo; Na wɔatow ndwom ama wo; Wɔbɔtow ndwom ama wo dzin."
"Hom mbra mbɔhwɛ Nyankopɔn no ndwuma; No ho yɛ hu wɔ ne ndzeyɛɛ mu wɔ adasamba ho."
"Ɔdaan po asaase kɛsɛɛ: Wɔdze anamɔn twaa esutsen no: Hɔ na hɛn enyi gyee no mu."
"Ɔdze no tum dzi hen daa; N’enyiwa tua amanaman: Mma mma etuatsewfo mmema hɔnho do."

column4: Na hom mma wɔntse n’ayɛyi ndze:"

column2: "Ɔno na ɔdze hɛn aka atseasefo ho
column3: Na ɔmma kwan mma hɛn anan mmpatser."

column2: "Na ɔwo Nyankopɔn asɔ hɛn ahwɛ: Ɔwo anan hɛn ahwɛ dɛ mbrɛ wɔnan dwetɛ hwɛ."
"Ɔwo edze hɛn ato efir mu; Ɔwo edze adzesoa pembɔɔ ato hɛn asen."
"Na ama nyimpa anantsew edua hɛn tsir do; Yɛfaa ogya na nsu mu kɔree. Na ɔwo edze hɛn aba mbrɛ ndzepa ebu do."

column6: Na m’ano kae wɔ m’ahohiaber mu no."

column2: "Medze mbowa a wɔadɔ seradze bɔbɔ wo hyew afɔr
column3: Ɔnye nguannyin huam; Medze anantwisaa nye mpɔnkye bɔbɔ afɔr."

column4: Na mebɛka dza ɔayɛ ama me akyerɛ hom."

column3: Na medze me tɛkyerɛma tontoon no."

column2: "Sɛ mubu emumuyɛ bi wɔ m’akoma mu a
"Na ampaara Nyankopɔn etsie me; Ɔakyɛn aso ama me mpaabɔ ndze."
"Nhyira nka Nyankopɔn a Ɔanndan me mpaabɔ enyi
column3: eso oennyi no mbɔbɔrhu emmfi mo do no."
